extension.description: This plugin check and send reminder to registrants automatically certain days after registration completed to remind them to complete payment.

field.name: last_run
field.label: Last Run Time
field.description: Store Last Run Time of the plugin

field.name: number_days_to_send_reminders
field.label: Number Days To Send Reminder
field.description: Number of days (after registration/before event date) registrants will receive offline payment reminder

field.name: number_days_to_cancel
field.label: Number Days To Cancel Registration
field.description: Number of days (after registration/before event date) registration will be cancelled if payment is not received

field.name: number_registrants
field.label: Number Registrants
field.description: Number of registrants which we will process each time the plugin runs

field.name: event_ids
field.label: Events
field.description: If you want the process is handled for certain events only, select the events you want in this parameter. Otherwise, this plugin will process all events

field.name: base_on
field.label: Send Reminder and Cancel Registration Base On
